features: YO JOE! G.I. JOE EXPLODES INTO A LARGER-THAN-LIFE ERA WITH 6-INCH-SCALE FIGURES: The G.I. Joe Classified Series evolves the characters fans know and love into a highly articulated 6-inch scale with premium deco and detailing
CLASSIC ZARANA-INSPIRED DESIGN: This figure features a classic design updated to bring the Cobra Mercenary into the modern era, plus accessories inspired by the character’s rich history

COLLECTIBLE PACKAGING WITH CUSTOM ART: Joining some of the best artists from the world of comics and graphic design in our artist partnership program, Marcus Williams adds a unique style to the Zarana package

HIGHLY POSEABLE WITH PREMIUM DETAILING: This G.I. Joe Classified Series Zarana figure features premium detailing and articulation for dramatic action poseability (some poses may require additional support)
EXPAND YOUR ROSTER: Look for other 6-inch-scale G.I. Joe Classified Series figures and build your roster of heroes and villains (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
body.description: G.I. Joe is a highly skilled, on-demand, special operations force of men and women from around the globe. These extraordinarily talented heroes are selected for their elite abilities and tasked with defending the world from Cobra, a ruthless criminal organization bent on total domination. With unwavering courage and steely determination, the brave members of G.I. Joe are prepared to seek out Cobra in any environment on the planet. From hostile jungles to ice-clad arctic peaks…wherever tThis Zarana figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and 6 character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by Marcus Williams, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Zarana package will make a mark on shelves.here’s trouble, G.I. Joe is there.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yo Joe! The world of G.I. Joe has always evolved to reflect the times we live in, and the evolution continues with the Classified Series. Whether you’re dipping your toe into collecting G.I. Joe figures for the first time, the fifth time, or the four hundredth time, the G.I. Joe Classified Series line of action figures captures the pulse-pounding excitement of G.I. Joe in a 6-inch scale. And it’s all showcased in collectible display-worthy packaging featuring custom artwork by talented artists from around the world, commissioned by Hasbro to put their iconic stamps on classic characters.

Yo Joe! The world of G.I. Joe has always evolved to reflect the times we live in, and the evolution continues with the Classified Series. Whether you’re dipping your toe into collecting G.I. Joe figures for the first time, the fifth time, or the four hundredth time, the G.I. Joe Classified Series line of action figures captures the pulse-pounding excitement of G.I. Joe in a 6-inch scale. And it’s all showcased in collectible display-worthy packaging featuring custom artwork by talented artists from around the world, commissioned by Hasbro to put their iconic stamps on classic characters.

Classic G.I. Joe Design in 6-Inch Scale G.I. Joe Classified Series is loaded with iconic personalities from the epic history of the G.I. Joe franchise. These fan-favorite characters are presented in 6-inch scale with premium detailing, packaging, accessories, and advanced articulation allowing for dramatic poses, all of which raise the vibrant heroes and villains of G.I. Joe to the next level. With a robust roster of G.I. Joe and Cobra characters, the Classified Series of G.I. Joe action figures pays homage to the brand’s iconic past while embracing the modern.

Classic G.I. Joe Design in 6-Inch Scale G.I. Joe Classified Series is loaded with iconic personalities from the epic history of the G.I. Joe franchise. These fan-favorite characters are presented in 6-inch scale with premium detailing, packaging, accessories, and advanced articulation allowing for dramatic poses, all of which raise the vibrant heroes and villains of G.I. Joe to the next level. With a robust roster of G.I. Joe and Cobra characters, the Classified Series of G.I. Joe action figures pays homage to the brand’s iconic past while embracing the modern.

Custom Package Art by Renowned Artists The G.I. Joe Classified Series features collectible packaging with gallery-worthy custom art by some of the best artists from the world of comics and graphic design in our artist partnership program. The program gathers together a diverse and ultra-talented group of artistic visionaries who bring their unique perspective to the world of G.I. Joe. The dynamic illustrations by these renowned creators practically leap off of the package and showcase their personal passion for the G.I. Joe characters and history.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Gorgeous Figure
reviews.reviewText: An absolutely gorgeous figure from Hasbro. And the first really new female tooling we have seen in quite awhile. She stands tall. An in scale 5'11-6'. Taller and broader than the other Classified ladies.The sculpt is excellent. With new details you discover each time you pick her up. Headsculpt is a snarling delight. Lots of texture. She even has some sculpted and really subtle scars on the right side of her abdomen. Lots of paint details. Good articulation.Accessories include an assault rifle with a saw blade. A fiery heated knife. and a unique to the character stiletto.She is a must have for your GI Joe collection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Zaranna, now at retail!
reviews.reviewText: For fans of the 25th Anniversary revival of GI Joe, one of the great injustices was how many big name characters were only available as convention exclusives. Zartan's evil sister was one of those big name characters who was sadly priced out of reach for most fans because of this. But with GI Joe Classified, Zarana is available at retail for a price that won't bust your bank account.But while beautifully designed and sculpted, the figure has two big problems: Zarana's shoulder pads limit your ability to move her arms up and down, while the character (like Lady Jaye) suffers from the fact that rather than giving her two head sculpts (one with her butch haircut that her original action figure had and one with the more feminine pixie cut that her cartoon and comic counterpart had), Zarana instead has two hair pieces that can be switched out depending on how you want to display her. A shame, as Hasbro has shown willingness to do alternate head sculpts for their Marvel Legends line.But problems aside, it's a really decent figure and a worthy addition for one's GI Joe Classified collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for collectors and playroom battles
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite characters from the cartoon series. Great detail and joints for awesome action poses, not good for younger soldiers that still explore with their mouths. Perfect for table top displays or bedroom conquering with other action figures.
